attributes.action: Phones Should Be Allowed In Mosque For Student Blackburn with Darwen&RestOfTheUK
attributes.additional_details:
Using Mobile Phones can bring many benefits…
1. it can help you research about prophets
2.It can be used in an emergency
3.Make Phone calls to parents (if child needs to be picked up)
And there’s many more and 1 more important thing I forgot to mention is that even the mosque teachers are not allowed to bring mobile phone:(!!!!!!
attributes.background: Hi I am making this petition to tell people that phones should be allowed in mosques and you should not get kicked out the mosque if you a carrying a mobile phone (for mosque students). A recent incident happened where I had my phone and I got in major trouble and I maybe on my last chance…
